about.title: About Us
about.description: Learn more about our story and mission.

meta.title: About Us - Ekleelabha
meta.description: Discover Ekleelabha, your trusted destination for pharmacy and personal care products in Saudi Arabia. Quality products at reasonable prices since 2022.

hero.title: Your Trusted Partner in Personal Care
hero.subtitle: At Ekleelabha, we are dedicated to providing high-quality pharmacy and personal care products at prices that make sense. Established in 2022 and proudly originating from the South of Saudi Arabia, we bring care closer to you.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Founded in 2022, Ekleelabha emerged from the heart of Southern Saudi Arabia with a clear vision: to make quality pharmacy and personal care products accessible to everyone at reasonable prices.
story.paragraph2: Our journey began with a simple belief that healthcare and personal care shouldn't be a luxury. We partner with trusted suppliers and brands to ensure every product we offer meets the highest standards of quality and authenticity.
story.paragraph3: Today, Ekleelabha continues to grow while staying true to our rootsâ€”serving our community with dedication, integrity, and a commitment to your well-being that defines who we are.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide our customers with premium pharmacy and personal care products at affordable prices, backed by exceptional service. We believe quality healthcare and personal care should be within everyone's reach, and we work tirelessly to make that a reality.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do at Ekleelabha.

authenticity.title: Quality First
authenticity.description: We guarantee 100% authentic, high-quality products. Every item is sourced from trusted suppliers and verified brands you can rely on.

excellence.title: Affordable Excellence
excellence.description: We believe quality doesn't have to come at a premium. We work hard to offer the best products at reasonable prices.

passion.title: Customer Care
passion.description: Your health and well-being are our priority. We go the extra mile to ensure you find exactly what you need.

community.title: Rooted in Community
community.description: Born in the South, we understand and serve our community with products and services tailored to local needs.

innovation.title: Continuous Improvement
innovation.description: We constantly expand our product range and enhance our services to serve you better every day.

trust.title: Trust & Transparency
trust.description: Honesty is at our core. We build lasting relationships through transparent practices and reliable service.

cta.title: Experience the Ekleelabha Difference
cta.description: Explore our wide range of pharmacy and personal care products. Quality you can trust at prices you'll love.

hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.subtitle: Find quick answers to the most common questions about shopping, shipping, payments, and more.

orders.title: Orders & Shopping
orders.q1: How do I place an order?
orders.a1: Simply browse our products, add items to your cart, and proceed to checkout. You can check out as a guest or create an account for faster future purchases. Follow the steps to enter your shipping address, select a payment method, and confirm your order.
orders.q2: Can I modify or cancel my order after placing it?
orders.a2: You can modify or cancel your order within a short window after placing it, as long as it hasn't been processed for shipping. Please contact our customer support immediately at 0575637926 or email support@ekleelabha.com to request changes.
orders.q3: How can I track my order?
orders.a3: Once your order is shipped, you will receive an email with a tracking number and a link to track your shipment. You can also track your order by logging into your account and viewing your order history.

shipping.title: Shipping & Delivery
shipping.a1: Standard delivery typically takes 3-5 business days within Saudi Arabia. Delivery times may vary depending on your location and product availability. Express shipping options may be available for select areas.
shipping.a2: Shipping fees depend on your order value and location. We offer free shipping on orders above a certain threshold. The exact shipping cost will be calculated and displayed at checkout before you complete your purchase.
shipping.q3: Do you deliver to all areas in Saudi Arabia?
shipping.a3: Yes, we deliver to all major cities and regions across Saudi Arabia. For remote areas, delivery times may be slightly longer. Enter your address at checkout to confirm delivery availability to your location.

payment.title: Payment Methods
payment.q1: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.a1: We accept various payment methods including credit/debit cards (Visa, Mastercard), Mada cards, Apple Pay, and Cash on Delivery (COD). All online payments are processed securely through encrypted payment gateways.
payment.q2: Is it safe to pay online on your website?
payment.a2: Absolutely. We use industry-standard SSL encryption and partner with trusted payment providers to ensure your payment information is fully protected. We never store your complete credit card details on our servers.
payment.q3: When is my card charged for an order?
payment.a3: Your card is charged when you confirm your order. For Cash on Delivery orders, you pay the delivery agent when you receive your package. If an order is canceled, any charged amount will be refunded within 7-14 business days.

returns.title: Returns & Refunds
returns.a1: You can return most products within 14 days of purchase, provided they are unused, unopened, and in their original packaging. Some items like personal care products that have been opened cannot be returned for hygiene reasons.
returns.q2: How do I return a product?
returns.a2: To initiate a return, contact our customer support with your order number and reason for return. Once approved, you'll receive instructions on how to send the product back. You can also visit our Help page for detailed return instructions.
returns.q3: How long does it take to receive a refund?
returns.a3: Once we receive and inspect your returned item, refunds are typically processed within 7-14 business days. The refund will be credited to your original payment method. You'll receive an email confirmation once the refund is processed.

account.title: Account & Profile
account.q1: How do I create an account?
account.a1: Click on the 'Sign Up' or 'Register' button at the top of the page. Enter your email address, create a password, and fill in your personal details. You can also register during checkout to save your information for future orders.
account.q2: I forgot my password. How can I reset it?
account.a2: Click on 'Forgot Password' on the login page, enter your registered email address, and we'll send you a link to reset your password. The link is valid for a limited time, so please reset your password promptly.
account.q3: How do I update my personal information?
account.a3: Log into your account and navigate to 'My Account' or 'Profile Settings'. From there, you can update your name, email, phone number, addresses, and password. Remember to save your changes.

products.title: Products & Quality
products.a1: Yes, we guarantee 100% authentic products. We source all our pharmacy and personal care products directly from authorized distributors and trusted brands. Every product we sell is genuine and properly stored to maintain quality.
products.q2: What if I receive a damaged or wrong product?
products.a2: We apologize for any inconvenience. Please contact our customer support within 48 hours of receiving your order with photos of the damaged or incorrect item. We will arrange for a replacement or full refund promptly.
products.q3: How should I store the products I purchase?
products.a3: Storage instructions vary by product type. Generally, keep products in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight. Always check the product label for specific storage instructions. Refrigerated items will be clearly marked during checkout.

contact.title: Still Have Questions?
contact.description: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Our customer support team is here to help you.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy

meta.title: Privacy Policy - Ekleelabha
meta.description: Learn how Ekleelabha collects, uses, and protects your personal information.

hero.title: Privacy Policy
hero.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us. Learn how we collect, use, and protect your information.

privacyPolicy.introduction: At Ekleelabha, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or make a purchase. Please read this policy carefully to understand our practices.

collection.title: 1. Information We Collect
collection.intro: We collect information that you provide directly to us and information that is automatically collected when you use our website.

personal.title: Personal Information:
personal.name: Full name and contact details
personal.payment: Payment information (processed securely through payment providers)

automatic.title: Automatically Collected Information:
automatic.device: Device type, operating system, and browser information
automatic.browsing: Pages visited, time spent on pages, and navigation patterns

usage.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
usage.intro: We use the information we collect for the following purposes:

points.orders: Process and fulfill your orders, including shipping and delivery
points.communication: Communicate with you about your orders, inquiries, and customer service
points.improve: Improve our website, products, and services
points.personalize: Personalize your shopping experience and send relevant offers
points.security: Detect and prevent fraud and maintain security
points.legal: Comply with legal obligations and protect our rights

sharing.title: 3. Information Sharing
sharing.intro: We may share your information with third parties only in the following circumstances:

points.service: Service providers who assist in our operations (e.g., hosting, analytics)
points.payment: Payment processors to complete your transactions securely
points.delivery: Shipping companies to deliver your orders
points.legal: Legal authorities when required by law or to protect our rights

sharing.noSell: We do not sell, rent, or trade your personal information to third parties for marketing purposes.

security.title: 4. Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

measures.ssl: SSL encryption for all data transmission
measures.access: Limited access to personal data on a need-to-know basis

cookies.title: 5. Cookies & Tracking
cookies.intro: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your browsing experience and analyze website traffic.

types.essential: Essential cookies: Required for website functionality
types.analytics: Analytics cookies: Help us understand how visitors use our site
types.preferences: Preference cookies: Remember your settings and preferences

cookies.control: You can control cookies through your browser settings. Disabling certain cookies may affect website functionality.

rights.title: 6. Your Rights
rights.intro: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:

points.access: Access: Request a copy of the personal data we hold about you
points.correction: Correction: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete data
points.deletion: Deletion: Request deletion of your personal data (subject to legal requirements)
points.optout: Opt-out: Unsubscribe from marketing communications at any time

retention.title: 7. Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy, comply with legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements. When data is no longer needed, we securely delete or anonymize it.

updates.title: 8. Updates to This Policy
updates.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We will notify you of significant changes by posting the updated policy on our website with a new effective date. We encourage you to review this policy periodically.

children.title: 9. Children's Privacy
children.content: Our website is not intended for children under 18 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you believe we have collected information from a child, please contact us immediately so we can delete it.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or wish to exercise your rights, please contact us:

returnPolicy.title: Return Policy

meta.title: Return & Refund Policy - Ekleelabha
meta.description: Learn about Ekleelabha's return and refund policies, eligibility requirements, and how to initiate a return.

hero.title: Return & Refund Policy
hero.subtitle: We want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase. If you're not happy, we're here to help.

returnPolicy.introduction: At Ekleelabha, customer satisfaction is our top priority. If you are not entirely satisfied with your purchase, we're here to help. Please read our return and refund policy carefully to understand your rights and our procedures.

eligible.title: Eligible for Return
eligible.item1: Products returned within 14 days of delivery
eligible.item3: Products with all original tags and labels attached
eligible.item4: Items accompanied by original receipt or order confirmation

notEligible.title: Not Eligible for Return
notEligible.item1: Opened personal care or hygiene products
notEligible.item3: Items that have been used or damaged by the customer

step1.title: Contact Customer Support
step1.description: Reach out to our customer service team via email at support@ekleelabha.com or call 0575637926 with your order number and reason for return.

step2.title: Get Return Authorization
step2.description: Our team will review your request and provide you with a Return Authorization (RA) number and instructions for shipping the item back.

step3.title: Pack and Ship
step3.description: Securely pack the item in its original packaging and ship it to the address provided. Include the RA number on the package.

step4.title: Receive Your Refund
step4.description: Once we receive and inspect the returned item, we will process your refund within 7-14 business days to your original payment method.

card.title: Original Payment Method
card.description: Refunds are credited to the same payment method used for the original purchase.

time.title: Processing Time
time.description: Refunds are processed within 7-14 business days after we receive and inspect the returned item.

shipping.title: Shipping Costs
shipping.description: Original shipping costs are non-refundable. Return shipping is the customer's responsibility unless the item was defective.

notes.title: Important Notes
notes.note1: For defective or damaged products, please contact us within 48 hours of receiving your order with photos of the damage.
notes.note2: Exchanges are subject to product availability. If the requested item is out of stock, a full refund will be provided.
notes.note3: Promotional items and gift cards are non-refundable and cannot be exchanged.

contact.title: Need Help with a Return?
contact.description: Our customer support team is ready to assist you with any questions about returns and refunds.

shipping.title: Shipping Information
shipping.description: Learn about our shipping methods and policies.

meta.title: Shipping & Delivery - Ekleelabha
meta.description: Learn about Ekleelabha's shipping options, delivery times, coverage areas, and policies.

hero.title: Shipping & Delivery
hero.subtitle: Fast, reliable delivery across Saudi Arabia. We ensure your orders reach you safely and on time.

homeDelivery.title: Home Delivery
homeDelivery.description: Get your order delivered right to your doorstep. Free shipping on orders over 250 SAR, otherwise 20 SAR delivery fee applies.

branchPickup.title: Branch Pickup
branchPickup.description: Pick up your order from our branch at your convenience. No delivery fees apply.

freeShipping.title: Free Delivery on Orders Over 250 SAR!
freeShipping.description: Enjoy free home delivery on all orders above 250 SAR anywhere in Saudi Arabia.

coverage.title: Delivery Coverage
coverage.description: We deliver to all major cities and regions across Saudi Arabia.
coverage.note: And many more cities and regions throughout the Kingdom!

secure.title: Secure Packaging
secure.description: All products are carefully packaged to ensure they arrive in perfect condition.

tracking.title: Real-Time Tracking
tracking.description: Track your order every step of the way with our real-time tracking system.

cod.title: Cash on Delivery
cod.description: Pay when you receive your order. Available throughout Saudi Arabia.

info.title: Important Information
info.point1: Delivery times are estimates and may vary during peak seasons or holidays.
info.point2: You will receive an SMS and email notification when your order is out for delivery.
info.point3: Please ensure someone is available to receive the order at the delivery address.
info.point4: For remote areas, delivery may take an additional 1-2 business days.

contact.title: Questions About Shipping?
contact.description: Our customer support team is here to help with any shipping-related inquiries.

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service

meta.title: Terms of Service - Ekleelabha
meta.description: Read the terms and conditions for using Ekleelabha's website and services.

hero.title: Terms of Service
hero.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using our website and services.

termsOfService.introduction: Welcome to Ekleelabha. By accessing and using our website (www.ekleelabha.com), you acknowledge and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. These terms govern your use of our website, products, and services. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our website.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By using and accessing our website, you acknowledge and agree to be bound by these terms, and you agree to comply with all applicable laws and regulations. You acknowledge that you are responsible for compliance with any applicable local laws. All materials on this site are protected by applicable copyright and trademark laws.

account.title: 2. Account Registration & Use
account.intro: To use certain features of our website, such as making purchases, you must create an account. By creating an account, you agree to:

points.accurate: Provide accurate, complete, and up-to-date information about yourself
points.confidential: Keep your password and account information confidential and secure
points.responsible: Accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account
points.age: Confirm that you are at least 18 years old, or have parental/guardian consent

orders.title: 3. Products & Orders
orders.content: When you place an order on our website, you are making an offer to purchase products subject to these terms. We reserve the right to accept or decline your order at our discretion.

points.prices: All prices are displayed in Saudi Riyals (SAR) and include VAT where applicable
points.availability: Product availability is subject to change without notice
points.cancel: We reserve the right to cancel orders in cases of pricing errors, suspected fraud, or stock unavailability
points.quality: We guarantee 100% authentic products from authorized suppliers

points.methods: We accept payment via credit/debit cards (Visa, Mastercard, Mada), Apple Pay, and Cash on Delivery
points.currency: All transactions are processed in Saudi Riyals (SAR)
points.refunds: Refunds for canceled orders will be processed within 7-14 business days

points.fees: Delivery fees apply for orders below certain thresholds
points.freeShipping: Free shipping is available for qualifying orders
points.times: Delivery times vary by location and product availability

returns.title: 6. Returns & Refunds
returns.intro: We want you to be satisfied with your purchase. If you need to return a product, please note the following:

points.period: Returns must be initiated within 14 days of purchase
points.condition: Items must be unused, unopened, and in their original packaging
points.receipt: Proof of purchase is required for all returns
points.refundTime: Approved refunds will be processed within 7-14 business days

exceptions.title: Returns are not accepted for:
exceptions.opened: Products that have been opened, used, or tampered with

disclaimer.title: 7. Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: The information and products on our website are provided for general informational purposes. While we strive for accuracy, we do not guarantee that all information is complete, current, or error-free. We are not liable for any damages arising from the use of our website or products. Always read product labels and consult professionals when necessary.

intellectual.title: 8. Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: All content on this website, including text, graphics, logos, images, and software, is the property of Ekleelabha and is protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws. You may not reproduce, distribute, modify, or create derivative works without our prior written consent.

governing.title: 9. Governing Law
governing.content: These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. You irrevocably submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Saudi Arabia for any disputes arising from these terms or your use of our website.

modifications.title: 10. Modifications
modifications.content: Ekleelabha reserves the right to modify these terms at any time without prior notice. By continuing to use our website after changes are posted, you accept the modified terms. We encourage you to review this page periodically for updates.

contact.title: Questions?
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact our customer support team at support@ekleelabha.com or call us at 0575637926.

contact.pageDescription: Have questions about our products or services? We're here to help. Reach out to us through any of the channels below.
contact.formDescription: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.
contact.messagePlaceholder: Tell us more about your inquiry...
contact.messageHint: Please provide as much detail as possible
contact.successMessage: Message sent successfully! We will get back to you soon.
contact.supportInfo1: Our customer support team is available Saturday through Thursday, from 9 AM to 9 PM.
contact.supportInfo2: For urgent inquiries, please call us directly or send a WhatsApp message.
contact.supportInfo3: We strive to respond to all emails within 24 business hours.

validation.nameMin: Name must be at least 2 characters
validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
validation.subjectMin: Subject must be at least 5 characters
validation.messageMin: Message must be at least 10 characters

secure.title: 100% Secure

variety.title: Multiple Options

cod.title: Cash on Delivery

info.point2: Your card will be charged when you confirm your order.
